definition: saliva/sweat/a ferry crossing/a ford (river crossing)/abbr. for Tianjin 天津
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: The main topic of the meeting was expected to be the political crisis in Zimbabwe.
sentences.chinese: 預計，這次首腦會議的主題是津巴布韋的政治危機。

sentences.english: She grew up in Zimbabwe, or Rhodesia as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 她生長在津巴布韋，當時該地叫羅得西亞。

sentences.english: Outside Leo Mugabe, President of Zimbabwe's association buttonholed me.
sentences.chinese: 津巴布韋足協主席萊奧穆加貝在外面攔住我。

sentences.english: The UZ has been closed for over six months now.
sentences.chinese: 津巴布韋大學已經關閉了六個多月了。

sentences.english: Aloudat says Zimbabwe's health system is completely shattered.
sentences.chinese: 阿洛達說，津巴布韋的醫療系統已經完全崩潰。

sentences.english: the one in Zimbabwe was never implemented.
sentences.chinese: 津巴布韋的選舉協議也從未能實行。

sentences.english: A significant number of Zimbabweans have got genuine international protection needs.
sentences.chinese: 大量津巴布韋人真正需要國際援助。

sentences.english: The electoral laws specifically prohibit members of the security forces from involvement in the elections.
sentences.chinese: 津巴布韋的選舉法特別禁止安全部隊人員介入選舉。

sentences.english: Picking is nearing completion in Zimbabwe and seed cotton deliveries are slowing.
sentences.chinese: 津巴布韋新花采摘接近尾聲，籽棉收購緩慢。

sentences.english: The real attention has to be on the plight of Zimbabweans.
sentences.chinese: 真正的關注點應該放在津巴布韋國家的困境上。

sentences.english: Zimbabwe’s experience was shocking, but not unprecedented.
sentences.chinese: 津巴布韋的經歷讓人震驚，但並非前無古人。

sentences.english: Sixty-one percent of Zimbabweans have only known Robert Mugabe's rule.
sentences.chinese: 61%的津巴布韋人只知道羅伯特穆加貝。

sentences.english: Zimbabwe is a scar on the conscience of the rest of southern Africa.
sentences.chinese: 津巴布韋是南部非洲良心上的一個刀疤。

sentences.english: This young Zimbabwean migrant does not have the means to attend school.
sentences.chinese: 這名年輕的津巴布韋移民沒有上學的機會。

sentences.english: He said these principles included recognition of Zimbabwe's sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這些原則包括承認津巴布韋的主權。

sentences.english: This population covers most of northern Botswana plus northwestern Zimbabwe.
sentences.chinese: 象頭數有北部博茨瓦納和西北津巴布韋的總和那麼多。

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2

definition: Dhaka, capital of Bangladesh/(Tw) Dakar, capital of Senegal
Chechnya, a republic in southwestern Russia/Chechen
Emirate/Sheikdom/used as translation for country under a chief
